text: Tenkasi is named as TENKASI because in Tamil Then means South. So it is called as South side of Kasi. Tenkasi is famous for Periya Kovil. The famous waterfall is COUTRALAM. You can come here to enjoy the pleasant nature. There are many Hotels:- * Sri Madhuram * Abu Dabi * Sountharyaa Hotel * Aasife. Category:Geography of Tamil Nadu
title: Tenkasi taluk
